data.title: Newspaper archive HISTORIA
data.meta_description: Gift the historic Basler Zeitung  via HISTORIA ✅ Authenticity certificate ✅ Customizable packaging ✅ Fast delivery
data.text:
Your perfect gift: Basler Zeitung

By gifting an authentic old newspaper from your desired date, you’re giving more than just printed paper:

A genuine journey back in time to a special day in the life of the recipient

A fascinating piece of history: authentic and original!

A personal gift that will impress

A party highlight: the perfect conversation starter

An unusual gift that evokes beautiful memories

Old newspapers take us back to the events of the past – from world-shaking headlines to amusing advertisements and classifieds to local news. Flipping through the old pages is an experience for all the senses – especially when it comes to original editions that have stood the test of time.

Get started now and secure an unforgettable gift!

You're just a few steps away from holding this unique gift idea in your hands:

Choose between

Old newspaper Basler Zeitung from "PURE" (incl. certificate of authenticity)

Old Newspaper Basler Zeitung from "PLUS": add our PREMIUM gift folder (incl. certificate of authenticity)

Personalize your gift with an individual message

Click on "add to cart" and proceed to checkout

It’s urgent? Choose "express delivery" for next-day delivery*

Discover Your Ordering Options

We offer you the best selection of accessories to turn your old newspaper into the perfect personal gift. Every old newspaper comes with a certificate of authenticity.

These options are available:

THE AUTHENTIC OLD NEWSPAPER "PURE"

For those who like it simple, we offer the pure old newspaper without frills. Authenticity certificate included.

NEWSPAPER IN OUR ELEGANT PREMIUM GIFT FOLDER

To present and protect your old newspaper in style, we recommend our premium gift folder:

Elegant look and feel

Made of cognac-colored padded faux leather

With a golden cord

Individually customizable: enough space for your personal

High-quality print in shiny golden letters

Ready in a flash

From our manufactory in Freiburg

Our tip: A old newspaper Basler Zeitung from alone is already a great gift, but in combination with one of our personalized accessories, it becomes a truly unique present that is going to be cherished.

Personalization Made Easy

Simply choose your favorite gift packaging and enter your desired text in the designated field. Turn your original newspaper Basler Zeitung from into a present that sends a personal message.

Authentic Contemporary History

We always send you the complete original newspaper as it was available back then at the newsstand. You will neither receive a copy nor a reprint, but the original vintage document. Please note:
